publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1668 Stuart McMillan: 100 Years of History for 3rd Gourock Company Boys’ Brigade—That the Parliament welcomes the historic milestone reached by the 3rd Gourock Company Boys’ Brigade of being in existence for 100 years and acknowledges that this is a great achievement for the organisation which will be showcasing memorabilia charting their 100 years of history at the Islay Hall in the Old Church Gourock and Ashton Church during April 2008. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Bashir Ahmad*, Ross Finnie*, Bill Kidd*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie Stone*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1668 100 Years of History for 3rd Gourock Company Boys’ Brigade (lodged on 2 April 2008) Bob Doris*
S3M-1668 100 Years of History for 3rd Gourock Company Boys’ Brigade (lodged on 2 April 2008) Karen Whitefield*
